name: Manus-Bond 75-AM HIGH GREEN STRENGTH
description: Manus-Bond 75-AM High Green Strength is an environmentally friendly, VOC compliant adhesive for the transportation industry. Manus-Bond 75-AM High Green Strength is designed to have very high green strength or initial tack to hold parts in place while the adhesive cures. The fast cure, high strength, low temperature flexibility, and ease of a one-part make Manus-Bond 75-AM High Green Strength the perfect choice for both manufacturing and repair.
